plot: The epic story of the family feud between the noble Pandava princes and their scheming cousins, the Kaurava kings.
plot_en: The epic story of the family feud between the noble Pandava princes and their scheming cousins, the Kaurava kings.
plot_es: The epic story of the family feud between the noble Pandava princes and their scheming cousins, the Kaurava kings.
title: Mahabharat
